nodes.text: A repulsorcart dumpster or repulsorlift dumpster was a mobile trash collection unit used by sanitation workers. Pushed by the worker, the repulsorcart dumpster was used to store trash that was picked up from public locations, such as items picked up by a trash punch. Sanitation workers emptied the dumpster into a disintegrator at a city services center at the end of the worker's shift. Birrge, a sanitation worker in Hanna City on the planet Chandrila, used a repulsorcart dumpster on a daily basis.
